name: BI-STATE
description:
A collaborative project, made as part of 'Game a Week 2 -  Duality' with  Lister_22 (https://itch.io/profile/lister-22) for Uni.

  • Defend your base and survive for as long as you can.
  • Switch between offensive and defensive modes
  • Play Single-player or 2-player local co-op.
  • Collect Power-up's

The theme of this week’s game was 'duality', the focus on two elements. This was implemented into our game in the form of the player having two states, a mobile mode and a stationary turret mode.

I'd love to continue work on this project, let me know what you think.
